attributes.additional_details:
Everyone should have the right to lit footpaths and to feel safe walking home after dark, This is no longer the case in Dovercourt & Harwich

Dovercourt & Harwich residents of all ages will be affected.
Fear of crime.
Pitch black streets.
People having to take a risk by walking through dark streets to get home.
Night workers will be affected .

LED environmentally lights could be fitted instead, which will save energy costs.
